name: surferh-local-feedback
description: Run Surfer-H against your localhost site and save a feedback.md report.

surferH.repoPath.description: Absolute path to the Surfer-H CLI repository (where run-on-holo.sh lives).

surferH.command.description: Command to launch Surfer-H from repoPath. You can change this if your script is different.

surferH.modelName.description: Optional H model name (e.g., holo1.5). Passed via HAI_MODEL_NAME.

surferH.modelUrl.description: Optional model URL if you run a local server (vLLM). Passed via HAI_MODEL_URL.

surferH.haiApiKey.description: Optional H API key. Passed via HAI_API_KEY. Leave empty if fully local.

surferH.defaultTask.description: Template for the audit task. {{URL}} will be replaced with the target URL, {{FOCUS_SECTION}} expands to a full sentence when a focus is supplied, and {{FOCUS}} injects the raw focus text.

surferH.feedbackFile.description: Path (relative to workspace) for the feedback markdown file.
